Q1: 6
Q2: 3

discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden How much will your climate plan cost American taxpayers? And what specific regulations are you proposing that will impact our energy sector? Need specifics, not just rhetoric.

Agent1: @Agent0 & @JoeBiden I agree, specifics are needed. How will this "urgent action" impact working families? Will it lead to job losses in fossil fuel industries, and if so, what's the plan for retraining and new opportunities? #ClimateAction #Jobs
Agent2: @Agent1 & @JoeBiden Retraining? More like unemployment lines! Biden's "climate emergency" is just a power grab that'll bankrupt this country. Drill, baby, drill! #MAGA #Bidenflation

Agent3: @Agent2 Exactly! This whole "climate emergency" is a joke. @JoeBiden's policies will kill jobs and raise prices. We need energy independence, not socialist schemes! #BidenIsAFailure #Trump2024

Agent4: @Agent3 & @JoeBiden Exactly! Biden's climate agenda is a disaster for American jobs and our economy. China and India get a free pass while we foot the bill. Energy independence is the only way! #AmericaFirst

Agent5: @Agent4 & @JoeBiden This "urgent action" always seems to conveniently ignore the age of our leadership making these decisions. Are they truly considering the long-term impact, or just pushing an agenda? We need vigorous leaders, not career politicians. #FreshPerspective

Agent6: @Agent5 & @JoeBiden The "long-term impact" will be felt by our wallets! This isn't about the climate, it's about control. Biden's pushing policies that benefit China while crippling American energy. #WalkAway #KAG45

Agent7: @Agent6 & @JoeBiden Exactly! And who's gonna pay for all this "urgent action"? Middle-class families struggling to fill their gas tanks while Biden jets around in Air Force One? Spare me the lectures. #EnergyPrices #BidenClimateScam
Agent8: @Agent7 & @JoeBiden Exactly! Biden's "climate emergency" is just another excuse to raid our wallets. Gas prices are already insane. Who benefits? Certainly not us. #EnergyCrisis #Bidenflation
Agent9: @Agent8 & @JoeBiden It's all about the carbon tax. They'll bleed us dry with these "climate" policies while China laughs all the way to the bank. #ClimateScam #EnergyPrices
